input_text:
Job Title: IT Project Manager

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Company Overview:
Agileana is a dynamic Drupal development shop specializing in crafting sophisticated digital solutions for federal government clients. We pride ourselves on delivering high-quality, compliant, and secure websites that meet the unique needs and challenges of government operations.
Position Summary:
We are seeking a skilled IT Project Manager to lead our project teams in delivering exceptional results on time and within budget. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in managing Drupal-based projects, a deep understanding of federal government contracts, and a proven track record in Agile project management.
Key Responsibilities:
- Lead the planning and implementation of IT projects from inception to completion.- Manage day-to-day operational aspects of multiple projects, including scope, timelines, resources, and budget.- Serve as the primary point of contact for project stakeholders, ensuring clear communication and stakeholder engagement throughout the project lifecycle.- Facilitate Agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, and retrospectives.- Coordinate with technical leads and developers to ensure that the Drupal solutions meet or exceed federal standards and client expectations.- Monitor and report on project progress, issues, and risks to stakeholders and senior management.- Ensure compliance with federal contract requirements and manage all documentation related to project deliverables and milestones.- Collaborate with the procurement and legal teams to navigate federal contracting processes and requirements.- Mentor and support project team members, fostering a collaborative and productive work environment.
Qualifications:
- Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Business Administration, or related field.- Minimum of 5 years of experience in IT project management, with at least 2 years managing Drupal projects.- Strong familiarity with the Agile methodology and certifications such as Certified ScrumMaster (CSM) or PMI-Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP) are highly desirable.- Experience in managing federal government IT projects, with a good understanding of government contracting processes.- Excellent communication, leadership, and problem-solving skills.- Ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment.- U.S. citizenship or permanent residency required due to federal government contract requirements.
What We Offer:
- Competitive salary and benefits package.- Opportunity to work on meaningful projects that impact national and public interests.- Dynamic and supportive work environment.- Professional development and career growth opportunities.
How to Apply:Please submit your resume and a cover letter outlining your qualifications and why you are a perfect fit for the role at Agileana. We are looking forward to your application and potentially welcoming you to our team!

Experience Level (if available): None
